Form.ReadOnly: This is a read only form

Vocal.MinLength: Your vocal is only {{length}}s. It must be at least {{min}}s.

Signup.passTooShort: The password must be at least 6 characters long
Signup.success: Your account has been successfully created. Check your emails to confirm your address.

Cells.noteam: You are not part of any team.
Cells.noeditorialcalendar: Your team does not have an editorial calendar.

GenerationSteps: The generation of the requested content takes place in 3 phases.

Contents are available as the treatments progress. When content is available at the end of a phase, a red dot appears next to the corresponding section. You may fix the content to improve next phases.
CustomizingPrompt: After customizing this prompt, it will be copied to your personal workspace.
AreYouSureToRemove: Are you sure to remove the element?
PromptStoreText: The goal is to be able to create your own prompts and save them so you can use them, share them, and monetize them.
A prompt editor will soon be made available to you.

CodeEditor.EditYourPrompt:
// Edit your prompt. Lines beginning with // or # are comments.
// Comments will be removed before to be sent to the AI.

WriteYourOwnPrompt: Write your own prompt. It will replace, for you only, the one presently used to generate LinkedIn post.
CreditsContent: During the test phase, credits are free. A flexible payment system will be implemented at the end of the tests.
DashboardSubtitle: Displays a summary of all your contents.
AddContentSubtitle: Displays the documents templates from which you can create some content.
InfosSubtitle: Advanced informations to understand what's going on under the hood.
SupportSubtitle: Displays resources you can use to get some help.
CreditsSubtitle: Displays your credits consumption and the opportunity to choose the plan that suits your needs.
AboutSubtitle: Displays informations about the Veep.AI app and use conditions.
Label: Title
Copy+C: Copy content with Ctrl+C (windows) or âŒ˜+C (Mac)
SystemPaused: System paused a few seconds so you can edit generated content if you wish. Don't forget to save your content, if needed, then click on Continue so the process resumes.
TranscriptionIsEmpty: ðŸ›‘ ðŸš¦ ðŸš§ Transcription is empty. URL can't be fetched for any reason (bad URL, javascript web site...) or content is empty which is an error. Indeed, it would ask the AI to work without any input data, which is meaningless.
ContextLengthMaybeExceeded: Your prompt may exceed AI 'memory'. Please read your generated content at the end to check all the information has been taken into account.
DocumentFileConstraint: Document (txt, pdf, doc, docx, xlsx, pptx, odt, ods, odp) < 20 MB
AllFileConstraints: According selected LLM for each prompt, the number of chars taken into acount after the transcription phase may vary (4,000 chars, 64,000 chars...)
ErrorContentTooBig: The size of the provided content ({{contentSize}}MB) exceeds the max authorized size ({{maxContentSize}}MB) for the '{{mimeType}}' document type.
NoResults: No results are satisfying your criteria.
Title: Title
Author: Author
MoveToTrashConfirmationDialogDesc: The document will be moved to trash. It can re restored
NumberOfGenerationsDesc: Showing the number of generations, complete or not
BePatient: App loading may take a few sec. Please be patient.
YourActivityDesc: Showing # of generations and # of tokens related to time
AITitleDialogDesc: Improve, translate, make shorter, make longer...
AIDialoLonggDesc: Act on selected text, give some additional instructions?
